summary: E2E testing of two new features: 1) Profile Comparison (/compare) with SHARE IT/KEEP IT/LIKE IT/MATCH IT card-swipe journey, 2) Division Dashboards (/divisions) with 12 divisions, Revenue Matrix, CapEx/OpEx charts. All features working correctly.

minor.issue: Returns 404 for demo user, frontend handles gracefully with fallback demo profile
Returns 404, frontend handles gracefully with demo family data

issues: Minor HTML nesting warning: Badge component inside p tag (line 808) - causes React hydration warning but doesn't break functionality

passed_tests: Profile Comparison page (/compare) loads successfully
Journey mode is default (active) on Compare page
SHARE IT card displays 'Share with those who didn't believe YOU' text
4 progress dots shown for journey steps (SHARE IT, KEEP IT, LIKE IT, MATCH IT)
Skip button (X) and Action button (checkmark) are visible and clickable
Swipe right (action button) on SHARE IT triggers share action
Swipe left (skip button) skips to next card
KEEP IT card appears after SHARE IT action
LIKE IT card appears after KEEP IT skip
MATCH IT card appears after LIKE IT action
Journey completion redirects to Family leaderboard
Family leaderboard shows 4 family members sorted by DoersScore (Sister: 810, You: 728, Father: 720, Mother: 680)
Division Dashboards (/divisions) loads successfully
All 12 divisions displayed (Technology, Science, Finance, Health, Education, Policy, Legal, Security, Transport, Food & Agriculture, Sport, Art & Creative)
Technology division has 'Deep Tech Priority' badge (ðŸš€)
Science division has 'Deep Tech Priority' badge (ðŸš€)
Revenue Matrix displays This Month, Target, and Last Month values
CapEx (Capital Expenditure) section shows Budget Utilization with progress bar
OpEx (Operating Expenditure) section shows Budget Utilization with categories (Salaries, Marketing, Operations, Others)
Pay Variability Matrix shows Product Contributors vs Sales Cut Agents
Navigation from DoersProfiler (/dp) to Compare page works via 'Compare DoersScore with Friends' button
Navigation from Captain Command (/captain-command) DASHBOARD tab to Divisions works via 'View All 12 Division Dashboards' button
critical_code_review_comments: ProfileComparison.jsx line 808: Badge component nested inside p tag causes React hydration warning - consider wrapping Badge in span instead of placing inside p
Division metrics in DivisionDashboards.jsx are generated client-side (MOCKED) - this is expected for demo purposes
seed_data_creation: None - used existing demo data and fallback profiles
context_for_next_testing_agent: Two new features tested: 1) Profile Comparison with card-swipe journey (SHARE IT â†’ KEEP IT â†’ LIKE IT â†’ MATCH IT) using framer-motion drag. Journey completes and redirects to Family leaderboard. 2) Division Dashboards with 12 divisions, Revenue Matrix, CapEx/OpEx charts, Pay Variability Matrix. Technology and Science divisions have 'Deep Tech Priority' badge. Division metrics are MOCKED client-side for demo. Navigation flows from DoersProfiler and Captain Command work correctly.
